actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration Integrity, Security, and Enforcement

official_title: To provide the notices of determination of the Secretary of Homeland Security and the Secretary of State entitled "Exercise of Authority Under Section 212(d)(3)(B)(i) of the Immigration and Nationality Act" shall have no force or effect.

summary.text:
Stopping Taliban Operatives from Penetrating Act or the STOP Act

This bill establishes that certain notices of determination from the Department of State and Department of Homeland Security shall have no effect. (Generally, these notices relate to the application of certain provisions that bar certain non-U.S. nationals, referred to as aliens in federal law, from entering the United States.)

titles.title: Stopping Taliban Operatives from Penetrating Act

To provide the notices of determination of the Secretary of Homeland Security and the Secretary of State entitled "Exercise of Authority Under Section 212(d)(3)(B)(i) of the Immigration and Nationality Act" shall have no force or effect.
